## Kaleigh Fisher, PhD

Services through DMF Data science are provided by Kaleigh Fisher, PhD who has expertise in data management, statistics, and biological research. She received her bachelor's and master's degrees in Biology from University of Michigan, followed by her PhD in Entomology from University of California, Riverside. She has collaborated on numerous national and international research projects related to bumble bee conservation and genomics, as well as led numerous government-funded research projects. She has taught Statistics, Evolutionary Biology, and Environmental Science as an instructor of record at University of California, Davis, and Santa Clara University.
